法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
The quality of the water used in the production of beverage shall meet the requirement of the Quality Standard of Drinking Water.

The caffeine contents of packed beverages shall meet the following requirements:
1.Coffee: Those products labeled as "low caffeine" shall not have more than 2 mg/100mL (20 ppm) caffeine.
2.Tea and cocoa: The caffeine contents shall not exceed 50mg/100mL (500 ppm).Those products labeled as "low caffeine" shall not have more than 2 mg/100mL (20 ppm) caffeine.
3.If beverages, other than tea, coffee and cocoa, contain caffeine, the caffeine contents shall not exceed 32 mg/100mL(320 ppm).
